StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_mg_InsertColleges]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as declare @dis.nct_coll_cd as varchar(4), @tLast1 as char(1), @tSchoolType as char(2), @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me
set @user_login = 'o_migra.on' set @update_date = getdate()
declare cur_arms cursor for select dis.nct(coll_cd) as dis.nct_coll_cd from vw_arms_o.cer
open cur_arms fetch cur_arms into @dis.nct_coll_cd
while (@@FETCH_STATUS = 0) begin set @tLast1 = substring(@dis.nct_coll_cd, 4,1) if isnumeric(@tLast1) = 1 set @tSchoolType = '4Y' else set @tSchoolType = '2Y'
/**** Hard coding organiza.on id to 4200, School Type to 'CC' *****/ insert into high_school(organiza.on_id, dod_code, school_type, user_login, update_date) values (4200, @dis.nct_coll_cd, 'CC', @user_login, @update_date)
fetch cur_arms into @dis.nct_coll_cd
end
close cur_arms deallocate cur_arms
